original_text: And if the plague come again, and break out in the house, after that he hath taken away the stones, and after he hath scraped the house, and after it is plaistered;
korean_text: 돌을 빼내며 집을 긁고 고쳐 바른 후에 색점이 집에 재발하면

sentences.original_text: And if the plague come again
and break out in the house
after that he hath taken away the stones
and after he hath scraped the house
